channel.title: Unity on Fraser McCann
channel.description: Recent content in Unity on Fraser McCann

item.title: Greatest of All Turtle
item.description:
A platformer where you can use your past self to get a leg up!

Jump on your corpses to succeed!


Created for AGDS Freshers Jam 2022

item.title: Reality Shift
item.description:
Honours Project Artifact


Mixed Reality card game app allowing gameplay online on your real tabletop!


Using the Meta Quest 3, projects onto the real environment while representing players with estimated full body avatars.

item.title: Touching the Moai is Forbidden
item.description:
Satirical horror based on 2010s viral hits.

Escape a creepy island while hunted by an evil Moai statue.


Created for AGDS Spooky Jam 2022
